roleset.name: to resolve or settle differences
roleset.note: MEDIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mediate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from mediate.01-v predicate notes)
MEDIATION-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. Comparison to mediate.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie (from mediation.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [W.J. Usery Jr. , labor secretary during the Ford administration ,]-1 was named [*-1]to mediate talks [*] to settle the six-month strike by the UMW .
example.arg: talks [*] to settle the six-month strike by the UMW

example.name: all args
example.text: The UN's mediation of talks between Russia and Iran

example.name: arg 0 as "first party"
example.text: China's mediation of conflict with Russia
